issue.title: [R] Make expect_dplyr_equal() more intuitive
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14310](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14310). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Possible things to do:
- rename this function so it doesn't break people's model of how `expect_*` functions work
- add inline comments to chunks to simplify
- add a description in the oxygen header to describe in a few sentences what it's doing

comments.body:
